page.title: 11INDUSTRY - Iron mining.
page.content: In our survey there were{four {mines.}Each one was an{iron-stone mine. All of the mines are{closed because the ore has run out or it is too dangerous to mine. Most of the mines{opened in the mid 1800's}and {closed in the 1960's. The mine spoil-heaps have been levelled and{landscaped.}As the mines are now closed, the mining{houses have {been demolished}because nobody is living in them. The levelled spoil heaps are now spaces for{recreation and leisure. At Margrove Park the South Skelton mine-heaps have been used for a BMX track. In Lingdale{new housing estates and a{community centre}were built in 1980. The old mining buildings have now been used for a{light-industrial {estate.
